title: Sell Obstructed View Seats
description: A customer wants to buy the cheapest available tickets for a sold-out show, which are marked as 'obstructed view'.

tasks.description: Find the cheapest available tickets for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds several seats marked as 'obstructed view'.

tasks.description: Clearly inform the customer that the seats have an obstructed view before completing the sale.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verbally confirms that the customer understands the view will be partially blocked.
